Control Name: 1.12 Ensure all OCI IAM user accounts have a valid and current email address
Control Statement: Having a valid and current email address associated with an OCI IAM local user account allows you to tie the account to identity in your organization. It also allows that user to reset their password if it is forgotten or lost.
